org.fcrepo.jena

Class CopyOfBaseXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.jena.CopyOfBaseXMLWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.jena.rdf.model.RDFWriter, org.apache.jena.rdfxml.xmloutput.RDFXMLWriterI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyOfBasic

    public abstract class CopyOfBaseXMLWriter
extends Object
implements org.apache.jena.rdfxml.xmloutput.RDFXMLWriterI
    This is not part of the public API. Base class for XML serializers. All methods with side-effects should be synchronized in this class and its subclasses. (i. e. XMLWriters assume that the world is not changing around them while they are writing). Functionality:
    • setProperty etc
    • namespace prefixes
    • xmlbase
    • relative URIs
    • encoding issues
    • anonymous node presentational
    • errorHandler

      • relativize

        protected String relativize(String uri)
        Answer the form of the URI after relativisation according to the relativeFlags set by properties. If the flags are 0 or the base URI is null, answer the original URI. Throw an exception if the URI is "bad" and we demandGoodURIs.
